snippet: A study found that smokers with a variant of a gene connected to nicotine addiction are more likely to respond to higher taxes on cigarettes.
abstract: A study found that smokers with a variant of a gene connected to nicotine addiction are more likely to respond to higher taxes on cigarettes.

headline.main: Efficacy of Tobacco Taxes Tied to Gene Type
headline.print_headline: Prevention: Efficacy of Tobacco Taxes Tied to Gene Type
